$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I want to see your best, Amelia. Take
care of them, and I'll release you from
your contract.$k$p$WmMPID_アメリア,ch08_04_Amelia_F_Normal,Face|$w0|All right, then... I'll give it everything
I've got!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You too, Seth. You have to do what I
tell you, so get on with it.$k$p$WmMPID_ゼト,ch08_02_Seth_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Princess Veronica, I have just one
question for you. Why do you insist
on behaving like a child?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Because there's a voice telling me to.
And it tells me that I'm going to have
a lot of fun.$k$pWhy do you ask? I suppose you're
going to tell me that fighting is wrong,
aren't you?$k$p$WmMPID_ゼト,ch08_02_Seth_M_Normal,Face|$w0|No. Fighting is sometimes necessary,
for the sake of a kingdom and its
people.$k$pI doubt you're acting on their behalf,
though.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|The people...?$k$p$WmMPID_ゼト,ch08_02_Seth_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Yes. Everything is for their sake. A
true ruler cannot let their own selfish
desires lead them.$k$pThe burden of protecting the people is
overwhelming... It requires a person
of extraordinary character.$k$pI serve Prince Ephraim and Princess
Eirika. They are fit to rule. You, on the
other hand...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Oh, how tiresome you've become.
Get going. Now.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|$w0|We're done here, General. Princess
Veronica has issued the order to
retreat.$k$p$WmMPID_ゼト,ch08_02_Seth_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Acknowledged.$k$pI have no means to oppose this
contract, so I must obey... Regardless
of who forged it.$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|$w0|"Regardless of who forged it," is it?$k$pYet you do recognize Princess
Veronica's authority, General, or so it
seems to me.$k$p$WmMPID_ゼト,ch08_02_Seth_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Does it?$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You offered sharp criticism of her
actions. What could possibly motivate
that?$k$pI'll tell you. Only a subject who hopes
to see his ruler act justly—someone
loyal—would do that.$k$pLecturing a fool is as pointless
as talking to a rock. It's a waste of
time.$k$pIf you didn't recognize Princess
Veronica's right to rule, you wouldn't
bother to upbraid her for her actions.$k$p$WmMPID_ゼト,ch08_02_Seth_M_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$pAs I said, the retreat has been called.$k$p$Sbs150|
